title: Minutes away from Strip !
neighborhood: 335 E Harmon Ave. Las Vegas, NV
map_address: 335 E Harmon Ave. near Paradise and Harmon
posting_body: ['No credit check is required.', 'No application fee.', 'No lease.', 'Whether you are a family relocating to a new city, a business traveler, vacationer, or just making a new start here in Las Vegas we can be your living solution.', 'Our apartments are spacious, comfortable and equally affordable.', 'Our property is designed to serve you with many amenities including:', 'Fully Furnished Apartments', 'All Utilities Paid', 'FREE Cable TV', 'Kitchenettes, with stove and refrigerator', 'High Speed Internet Access (optional-extra)', 'Less than 1 mile to the Famous Las Vegas Strip', 'Near Restaurants and Shopping', 'Near Alexis Park', 'All Suites Resort/ Virgin Hotel and Casino', 'On-Site Laundry Facilities', 'Beautiful Pool (seasonal)', 'Onsite Maintenance', 'Onsite Property Management', 'Plenty of Parking', 'Courtesy Patrol', 'Less than 1 mile to the Famous Las Vegas Strip', 'Near Restaurants and Shopping', 'Call', 'show contact info', 'Thank You!']
